extendedInfo.description: Conquer Europe in Medieval Battlefields! Medieval Battlefields is a strategy game that takes you back to medieval Europe! Train your armies to defeat your enemies in over 20 SINGLE and MULTIPLAYER maps. Play with up to 8 people online or claim your victory alone. Fight on behalf of England, France, or the Vikings as you build up your castle and win land to finance your wars. Will your campaigns be filled with glory, or crushing defeat?Free version is limited content. You can unlock all features and gameplay modes within the game â Play ONLINE MULTIPLAYER with up to 8 people!â Single-player Campaigns, Skirmish and HotSeat (1 vs 1)â Play on your Android, PC, Mac, iOS device anytime anywhereâ Fight on behalf of English, French or savage Vikings â Create your team with other players and fight against other teams and players â Train units for close and long range combat, including artillery and castle siege units â 27 unique medieval army units, like swordsmen, cavalry, knights and longbowmen â Dozens of maps and battlefields â Online Top Players chart and ranking â In-game live chat

reviews.title: Great but needs more conquests!
reviews.comment: Additictive, easy to pick up, nice gameplay. Just wish there were more conquests and bigger maps. This could be expanded nicely.
reviews.author: SETH DAVIES

reviews.title: Good fun
reviews.comment: Really good tactical fun. Would like to see the units gain experience from fighting, and maybe a campaign mode?

reviews.title: Good, but needs improvements
reviews.comment: This game has big future if you add triple much different warriors, like seije towers(tall ones) dragons  mages \'n\' stuff. Allso as someone said this needs sensitivity toggle bar, really difficult to control. If you guys made some improvements this game is 5* rate and would be best. This game has wide future

reviews.comment: Effing awesome game in every aspect.   Exept it wont let me register allways says unknown problem and to refer to the website I go there try and register because you cant on the main site then you have to answer questions to things that are made up and give you dead URL\'s  PLEASE FIX!!!!
reviews.author: Jake Versteeg

reviews.title: touch screen sensitivity issue
reviews.comment: I have this on Desura and like the game so wanted the Droid version but it seems to have a serious problem (at least on my phone - ZTE Blade running Gingerbread).  On the main menu and on the castle screen (where you buy units and buildings) the touchscreen works fine, but on the game map screen it requires multiple touches for it to recognise I have clicked a unit or my castle.

reviews.title: Just one more turn
reviews.comment: Ever played a game where you wanted to make just one more turn before going to sleep and them you playing for another half an hour? Medieval Battlefields is just like that. It\'s also great to be able to play online against other players which can be unlocked from within the game.
